amll.openMenuViaRightClick: Please right-click anywhere to open menu
amll.buttonForDisplayOnly: This function is currently for display only, no actual feature included.

ttmlImportDialog.openButtonLabel: Search / Import lyrics from AMLL TTML DB
ttmlImportDialog.title: Search / Import lyrics from AMLL TTML DB
ttmlImportDialog.tip: Type your search keywords above, and click on a suggestion to import the lyrics into the database directly.
ttmlImportDialog.supportText: AMLL TTML DB is a free and open-source lyrics' database built by the AMLL community. Want to contribute your lyrics to AMLL TTML DB? Head over to the <1>GitHub repository</1> to learn more on how to submit!

main.noPlaylistTip: Nothing is here, try to create something?

toast.parsingMusicMetadata: Parsing metadata to add your track into playlist ({current, plural, other {#}} / {total, plural, other {#}})
toast.partiallyFailed: {succeed, plural, =0 {No song is} one {A song is} other {# songs}} added, but {errored, plural, =0 {no song is} one {a song is} other {# songs are}} failed to be added
toast.allFailed: {errored, plural, other {#}} songs failed to be added

amll-dev.title: Apple Music Like Lyrics Developer Page
amll-dev.warning: This page is for develop usage only, use it at your own risk! (Chinese only)

filter.placeholder: Search for playlists, song titles, artists, and more……

search.placeholder: Search for a song, artist, album, lyrics, playlists, or more
search.searchPlaylistResultAmount: 搜索到 {amount} 个播放列表

enableLyricSwapTransRomanLine.label: Swap Translation and Romanized Translation
enableLyricSwapTransRomanLine.description: Only valid when the above two are enabled.

lyricPlayerImplementation.label: Implementation of the Lyrics Player
lyricPlayerImplementation.description:
Currently, there are two lyrics rendering implementations:
- DOM: Implemented using DOM elements, currently the most comprehensive, but with high performance overhead
- Canvas: Implemented using Canvas, still under development, with excellent performance, but some details still need to be improved

enableLyricLineBlurEffect.label: Enable Text Blur Effect
enableLyricLineBlurEffect.description: Significantly impacts performance. If you encounter performance issues, try to disable this option. Enabled by default.

enableLyricLineScaleEffect.label: Enable Text Zooming Effect
enableLyricLineScaleEffect.description: Does not impact performance. Non-playing lyrics lines will be slightly reduced in size. Enabled by default

enableLyricLineSpringAnimation.label: Enable Text Spring Animation Effect
enableLyricLineSpringAnimation.description: Significantly impacts performance. If you encounter any performance issues, try to disable this option. Enabled by default.

advanceLyricDynamicLyricTime.label: Advance Lyric Timing
advanceLyricDynamicLyricTime.description: Advance the initial time sequence of the original lyrics line, so that the lyrics effect starts playing (word by word) just after the lyrics scroll ends. This behavior is closer to the effect of Apple Music, but in most cases, it will cause the lyrics at the end of the line to be switched to the next line before they have been played completely.

lyricWordFadeWidth.label: Gradient Transition Width of Each Word
lyricWordFadeWidth.description:
Adjust the gradient transition width of each word in lyrics, measured in the width of a full width character, with a default value of 0.5.
If you want to simulate the effect of Apple Music for Android, you can set it to 1.
If you want to simulate the effect of Apple Music for iPad, you can set it to 0.5.
To turn off the gradient transition effect of each word in lyrics, you can set it to 0.

verticalCoverLayout.label: Vertical Cover Layout Mode
verticalCoverLayout.description:
Layout mode when hiding lyric component:
- Automatic: use immersive cover layout when track cover is a video
- Default: force default cover layout
- Immersive: force immersive cover layout

showMusicAlbum.label: Show Album Title
showMusicAlbum.description: Enabling all three options simultaneously may not be aesthetically pleasing.

showBottomControl.label: Show Buttons at the Bottom
showBottomControl.description: This is the buttons at bottom in horizontal view, or buttons under playback buttons in vertical view.

fftDataRange.label: Audio visualization frequency range
fftDataRange.description: The unit is Hertz, which will affect the display effect of audio visualization and background jumping rhythm effect.

lyricBackgroundColor.label: CSS 背景属性值
lyricBackgroundColor.description: 等同于放入 background 样式的字符串值，默认为 #111111

lyricBackgroundFPS.label: Maximum FPS for Background Renderer
lyricBackgroundFPS.description: High impact on performance, but the actual cost is not significant. If you encounter performance issues, try to reduce this value. The default value is 60.

lyricBackgroundRenderScale.label: Background Resolution
lyricBackgroundRenderScale.description: High impact on performance, but the actual cost is not significant. If you encounter performance issues, try to reduce this value. The default value is 1 which means rendering pixel by pixel.

lyricBackgroundStaticMode.label: Static Mode
lyricBackgroundStaticMode.description:
Keep the background static except when switching song. If you encounter performance issues, consider enabling this option.
Note: Enabling this option will disable the background bouncing effect.

showStatJSFrame.label: Show performance statics
showStatJSFrame.description: Show fps, frame time, memory [Chromium only]. Less impact of performance.

lyricFont.subtitle: Lyrics Font Settings
lyricFont.tip: This option only affect LYRIC's font but other parts.

fontFamily.label: Font Family
fontFamily.description: Font name separated by comma, equals to font-family property in CSS. Leave blank to use default settings.

fontWeight.label: Font Weight
fontWeight.description: Equals to the font-weight property in CSS, set to 0 to use default value.

letterSpacing.label: Letter Spacing
letterSpacing.description: Equals to the letter-spacing in CSS, leave blank to use the default value.

about.subtitle: About
about.credits: Made by SteveXMH and all Contributors from GitHub

lyric.ttmlLyricTip: TTML lyric could contain translation and Romanized translation in a single file.
lyric.translationLyricDataTip: Paste LyRiC type of lyric content here, we will pair as translation by timestamp if they are the same or similar.
lyric.romanLyricDataTip: Paste LyRiC type of lyric content here, we will pair as Romanized by timestamp if they are the same or similar.

metadata.overrideSafeTip: Properties in this page will not override into source file.
metadata.changeCoverToImageOrVideo: Change cover image as image / video

error.title: An error occurred
error.desc0: An error occurred during execution. Please try refreshing the page. If the issue persists, please contact the developer.
error.desc1: If you know how to debug, you can see more precise error messages in the developer console.
